title: Paper Mate 22709 Intro Highlighter, Chisel Tip, Fluorescent Pink, 12-Pack
features: Bright, see-through ink stands out while making it easier to read highlighted information.
Ink is quick-drying, odorless and non-toxic.
Durable chisel tip marks in a variety of line widths, for broad highlighting or fine underlining.
Sturdy clip for portability and storage.
description: Bright, see-through ink stands out while making it easier to read highlighted information. Ink is quick-drying, odorless and non-toxic. Durable chisel tip marks in a variety of line widths, for broad highlighting or fine underlining. Sturdy clip for portability and storage. Includes 12 fluorescent pink highlighters.

Intro Highlighters feature a micro chisel point for marking wide and narrow lines of text. Water-resistant ink is quick-drying, odorless, nonpenetrating and nontoxic. Pen-shaped barrel offers a comfortable hold. Sturdy clip allows easy portability. Certified AP nontoxic.
